column1: NOTES: Data may not sum to total due to rounding. Arizona did not operate any 1915(c) waivers over the study period because all HCBS were provided through a 1115 managed care waiver. Rhode Island terminated its 1915(c) waivers in mid-2009 and provided services under a 1115 waiver. Vermont terminated its 1915(c) waivers in 2006 and provided services under a § 1115 waiver.
